Deep within the dark backdrop of Earth's moon the searing eye, the
temporar=
y home and base of the Minions of Unicron have been changing.
Machines that=
 had long been dormant have recieved orders, new machines
have been built a=
nd constructed and have come online. 

Across the moon's surface the inert =
form of Azureblade has been
transported to a remote part of the base where =
Krytek begins an
intense study of it. At the same time the rest of the mini=
ons have
come home: Cyclonus, Scourge, Deepstryke, Phobia, Nightrazor, Deci=
bel,
Tumult and the sweeps. All assuming their positions, poised to attack
=
Earth on command. 

Deep his own chamber Vorpal sat on his throne, his own =
optics poised
over a view screen as it probed the earth for weaknesses. Sen=
sors
watched the different Maximal and Predacon bases as well as the energy=

ores scattered across the Earth. His thoughts were dark and forboding,
his=
 optics lighting only as one of his chamber doors irised open
revealing the=
 purple form of Cyclonus. 

Tall and terrible Cyclonus stepped into the roo=
m, his movements calm
and commanding. Something has changed about him since=
 he has returned
from earth, something that Vorpal could not put a clawed f=
inger on,
but he suspected. 

"Yes." Vorpal's voice echoed through the mass=
ive chamber. 

"You know why I am here." Cyclonus' voice while lacking the =
volume was
no less powerful. 

Vorpral nodded once, "Yes. It is time." 

Cy=
clonus had completed his task, and yet there was more to be done.
The Earth=
 still had not been destroyed, and many Maximals and
Predacons still lived.=
 The energy of the earth was still not ready for
Unicron's consumption. 

W=
ith deliberate motions Vorpral tapped in command codes as once
darkened con=
soles lit up as power was applied. It was time for the
next step. 

Cyclonu=
s took his place and dropped to one knee, as Vorpral opened a
channel to a =
place far beyond the confines of this solar system.
 
"Lord Unicron!" Vorpa=
l and Cyclonus raised their voice in twined
unison. "We live to serve you! =
What are your commands?"

<TAG UNICRON!>
